mail.excerpt: Say goodbye to cluttered inboxes and missed messages.
mail.html:
Introducing Inbox

Say goodbye to cluttered inboxes and missed messages. Karaqu Inbox email software is designed to be fast, intuitive, and intelligentâ€”helping you focus on what matters most. Enjoy using Inbox,
Hakan Bilgin
